ygData.subject: Re: Jboots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: I was hoping for some new druid quests...  a good variety would be nice, even if it s not for full armor, but just a few things that would help us out, and not
ygData.messageBody:
I was hoping for some new druid quests... a good variety would be nice,
even if it's not for full armor, but just a few things that would help us
out, and not be something that every other class wants as well.

Jalisa


----- Original Message -----
From: Battlestaff Fuzzietoe <andrie@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 11, 1999 3:20 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Jboots, Rubi & Beyond


> From: "Battlestaff Fuzzietoe" <andrie@...>
>
> Verant Hates Druids. Or should I say Brad hates Druids. Just look at the
AC
> of our PoF Stuff. Our Boots are AC 6 where Clerics boots are AC 15. Shesh
> Casters didn't lose any thing Rubi Yet they have Amor Quest in the Temple.
> Oh Well. I still like my Druid, but could still use some better armor &
> Weapons
>
>
>
> I have heard that druids will NOT be getting new stuff. They didn't loose
it
> with Rubi anyways. *shrug* I think Verant likes Druids less than Shamans
;-)
